actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to House from the Committee on Armed Services, H. Rept. 94-643.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to make certain disability retirement determinations by the Secretaries of the military departments subject to review by the Secretary of Defense.

summary.text: Requires the Secretaries of the military departments to obtain the approval of the Secretary of Defense of any: (1) retirement because of physical disability; (2) placement on the temporary disabled retired list; or (3) separation because of physical disability, of any officer in pay grade 0-7 or higher or a Medical Corps officer.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to make certain disability retirement determinations by the Secretaries of the military departments subject to review by the Secretary of Defense.
